display_long_description:
Welcome to 'Buster Bots'—where Creativity meets Combat in mixed reality!

Customize adorable robots, assemble a formidable fighter, and give it a splash of your favorite colors.

Then, engage in intense brawling battles with friends or AI opponents by swinging your hands to unleash powerful punches, uppercuts or charged shots!

Battle your way to glory in your living room, your office, or one of the virtual spaces and floating bot arenas. Are you ready to unleash the ultimate robotic mayhem and become the Buster Bots champ!?

Features:
● Gameplay: Battle with friends in an intuitive hand, no controller needed, action!
● Built from the ground up for mixed-reality
● Integrates with Meta Friends invites and lobbies.
● Customize & express your robots by painting & assembling them from a unique array of bot parts.
● Comfort and Safety: Play in mixed reality or drop back into virtual reality easily. Turn off all player-made paintings to just focus on the combat.
● No need to move, all the action happens right in front of you!
● Utilizes peer-to-peer connections to eliminate server hiccups!

Join our Discord: https://busterbotsgame.com/discord
